scripts.build: npm run code && npm run lab
scripts.code: cd _compile && python build.py --include code --output ../build/code.js && python build.py --include code --minify --output ../build/code.min.js
scripts.lab: cd _compile && python build.py --include lab --output ../build/lab.js && python build.py --include lab --minify --output ../build/lab.min.js
